726932f-a.title: Queens: Irving Avenue - Covert Street
726932f-a.text:
Irving Ave., west from Covert Street, showing a panoramic view
of Brooklyn. The N.E. corner of Covert and Irving Ave. (riht fore-
ground, pipes thereoh) is in Queens County. The factory at the right
is that of Wm. Greilich and Sons Brass Goods Manufacturing Company
at the S.W. corner of Eldert Street and lIrving Ave.
December 1924.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
726932f-a.folder: Irving Avenue & Covert Street, Queens, NY

726428f-a.title: Queens: Covert Street - Irving Avenue
726428f-a.text:
Covert Street (left foreground; under construction), at the
S.W. corner of Irving Ave. (rig t, partially seen), showing in the
foreground a vacant corner upon which, in 1928, was erected a three
atory brick apartment. The factory at the right, located on the
S.W. corner of Eldert Street (parallel to Covert Street) and Irving
Ave., is that of Wm. Greilich and Sons.
December 1929.
Euene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
